descriptor.name: What is the selection process for this scholarship program?

value: The selection of scholars for the ‘SBIF Asha Scholarship Program for School Students 2023’ will be made on the basis of their academic merit and financial background

descriptor.name: If selected for this program, how will I receive the scholarship fund?

value: Upon selection, the scholarship amount will be directly transferred into the bank account of the scholars.

descriptor.name: Will I get this scholarship for subsequent years of studies?

value: No. This is a one-time scholarship for students studying in Classes 6 to 12.
